SEARCH
模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.Networking.Listeners

接口 Listener

所有超级接口:
Remote
所有已知实现类:
RMIClient, SocketListener, ViewListener
public interface Listener extends Remote
Interface for listeners that receive updates from the server. Implementations of this interface can receive messages and handle player information.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    Integer
    getGameID()
    Retrieves the game ID associated with the listener.

    Retrieves the nickname of the listener.

    Sets the game ID for the listener.

    Sets the nickname of the listener.

    update(Message msg)
    Method to handle incoming messages from the server.

      Method to handle incoming messages from the server.

      抛出:
      RemoteException - if there is an error with the remote method invocation

    • heartBeat

      void heartBeat() throws RemoteException
      Handles the heartbeat signal from the client. This method is invoked to indicate that the client is still active and connected. It is typically called periodically to ensure the client has not disconnected.
      抛出:
      RemoteException - if a communication-related exception occurs during the remote method call.
